sentences.sContent: I volunteered my services as a driver.
...which provide a volunteer coach and pay a nominal fee to send students to regional and state competitions...
...64% have done volunteer work and 62% have taken lessons in music...
...Many of them volunteer for community service with disadvantaged people...
...the volunteer would take them over to the shelf and point to it...

words.tran: 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的

trans.tranCn: 自愿； 自愿提供； 志愿
trans.tranOther: to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do
someone who does a job willingly without being paid
